channel.title: ShowFloorTips - Evergreen Trade Show Guides & Tools
channel.description: The best trade show guides, comparisons, tools, and exhibitor resources from ShowFloorTips. Timeless content for trade show professionals.

item.title: Free ROI Calculator: Measure Your Trade Show Return
item.description: Calculate your exact trade show ROI. Input costs, leads, and revenue to see CPL, pipeline value, and payback period. #TradeShow #ROI #ExhibitorTips

item.title: Compare Trade Shows Side by Side — Free Tool
item.description: Compare 2-3 trade shows head-to-head. Attendance, cost, dates, and ratings at a glance. #TradeShow #ExhibitorStrategy #ExhibitorTips

item.title: Interactive Trade Show World Map — 24,000+ Shows
item.description: Explore 24,000+ trade shows on an interactive world map. Filter by industry, country, and date. #TradeShow #ExhibitorTips #Events

item.title: Smart Packing List Generator for Trade Show Travel
item.description: Generate a custom packing list for your next trade show. City-specific items, role-based gear, progress tracking. #TradeShow #TravelTips #ExhibitorTips

item.title: Trade Show Trip Cost Estimator — Budget Before You Book
item.description: Estimate your full trade show trip cost: booth, travel, hotel, meals, shipping. 18 cities covered. #TradeShow #Budget #ExhibitorTips

item.title: Lead Value Calculator — Know What Each Scan Is Worth
item.description: Calculate the dollar value of every trade show lead. CPL, pipeline, ROI gauge, downloadable report. #TradeShow #LeadGen #ExhibitorTips

item.title: The Ultimate Trade Show Guide 2026 — Everything You Need
item.description: The complete guide to trade show success. 11 chapters, 149 links, from first-timer to veteran exhibitor. #TradeShow #ExhibitorTips #Guide

item.title: Trade Show Glossary — 100+ Terms Every Exhibitor Should Know
item.description: Drayage, I&D, pipe and drape, and 100+ more trade show terms explained. Searchable A-Z glossary. #TradeShow #ExhibitorTips #Glossary

item.title: $49.99 Mega Bundle — All 19 Trade Show Templates (Save 77%)
item.description: Get every ShowFloorTips template, checklist, spreadsheet, and guide for $49.99. 77% savings vs buying individually. #TradeShow #ExhibitorTips #Deal
